issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second comprehension test - 'operating system' metaphor unclear for SMB audience
issues.rationale: SMB owners won't grasp abstract OS concept quickly, causing immediate bounce

issues.description: No visible proof of 'observability' promise above fold - trust gap in first scan
issues.rationale: Core value prop 'visibility without losing control' needs immediate visual proof

issues.description: Sticky CTA missing or poorly differentiated from hero CTA - conversion continuity broken
issues.rationale: Users lose primary action path when scrolling past hero, reducing conversion momentum

issues.description: Pricing section buried or requires complex parsing - cognitive load too high
issues.rationale: SMB owners need instant price anchoring to qualify themselves, delays cause abandonment

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking puts CTA below fold - critical action hidden on first view
issues.rationale: 60% of SMB traffic is mobile, burying CTA below fold kills immediate conversion

issues.description: Audit log pattern missing or generic - no concrete proof of control retention
issues.rationale: Without seeing actual oversight UI, 'maintain control' claim feels empty

issues.description: Typography hierarchy weak - H1/H2/body distinction insufficient for scanning
issues.rationale: SMB owners scan quickly, poor hierarchy increases cognitive effort to find key info

issues.description: Section order doesn't follow problem→solution→proof→pricing narrative arc
issues.rationale: Non-linear flow creates confusion about value progression, reducing conversion clarity

issues.description: Trust proof bar missing or uses generic badges instead of specific SMB wins
issues.rationale: Generic trust signals don't resonate with SMB pain points around delegation

issues.description: Mobile tap targets under 48px or too close together - frustrating interaction
issues.rationale: SMB owners multitasking on mobile need generous tap zones to avoid mis-clicks

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace 'operating system' with concrete benefit: 'Delegate tasks, keep full visibility' + live dashboard preview
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete language + visual proof converts 3x better than abstract concepts for SMB audience

suggestedFixes.fix: Add live activity feed component showing real-time task updates in hero section (480px height min)
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate visual proof of observability promise builds trust in first 8 seconds

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky header CTA bar at 64px height with contrasting background, appears after 200px scroll
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent CTA maintains conversion path throughout entire scroll journey

suggestedFixes.fix: Move pricing to second section, use 3-column comparison table with highlighted recommended tier
suggestedFixes.rationale: Early price anchoring with clear comparison reduces qualification friction

suggestedFixes.fix: Stack hero as: headline (24px) → subhead (16px) → CTA (48px height) → image below fold
suggestedFixes.rationale: CTA above fold on mobile ensures immediate action opportunity on 375px screens

suggestedFixes.fix: Design audit log component with timestamps, user avatars, action descriptions (min 3 examples)
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete oversight UI screenshots prove control retention claim

suggestedFixes.fix: Set H2 to 32px desktop/24px mobile with 600 weight, 1.2 line height for clear section breaks
suggestedFixes.rationale: Stronger H2 treatment improves scannability and section comprehension

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder: Hero → Problem/Pain → Solution Demo → Proof/Testimonials → Pricing → CTA
suggestedFixes.rationale: Linear narrative builds conviction progressively, matching SMB decision flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Create SMB-specific proof bar: '500+ agencies automated' + 'Average 10hrs/week saved' + logos
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific SMB outcomes resonate more than generic trust badges

suggestedFixes.fix: Set all interactive elements to min 48x48px with 16px spacing between tap zones
suggestedFixes.rationale: Generous tap targets reduce friction for busy SMB owners on mobile devices

assumptions: Missing upstream designer outputs — critiquing based on brief directly
Assuming standard viewport breakpoints (375px mobile, 1440px desktop)
Assuming current design lacks live preview components for observability features
Assuming pricing is currently below fold or in later sections
